# Repeated Digits (0000, 1111, etc.)
0000
1111
2222
3333
4444
5555
6666
7777
8888
9999

# Sequential Patterns (1234, 4321, etc.)
1234
4321
654321
123456
321321
123123
456123
123789
789456
987654

# Same Digit Repeated (6-digit)
000000
111111
222222
333333
444444
555555
666666
777777
888888
999999

# Date-like Patterns (MMDD, DDMM, etc.)
0101
0202
0303
0404
0505
0606
0707
0808
0909
1010
1212
1101
1202
0201
0304
0403
1004
2000
2004
1998
1999
2020
2021

# Common Mirror/Alternating Patterns
112233
111222
1221
122112
101010
010101

# Keypad-based Patterns
2580  # middle column on keypad
147258
369258

6969
